response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted with excellence in mind. This product is not just an item; it's a testament to innovation and quality that we're confident will exceed your expectations. Given its exceptional features and craftsmanship, I believe it's worth more than its face value of $8,000. Considering its unique benefits and the value it can bring to you, I am offering it to you for $12,000.
